text: The Maryland Correctional Institution - Jessup is a medium security state prison for men located in Jessup, Anne Arundel County, Maryland. It opened in 1981, first as an Annex to the state House of Correction and then as a separate facility, and holds a maximum of 1068 male inmates at medium security. The facility is immediately across the street from Jessup Correctional Institution (JCI) and Dorsey Run Correctional Facility (DRCF) ==References== Category:Prisons in Maryland Category:Buildings and structures in Anne Arundel County, Maryland Category:1981 establishments in Maryland
title: Maryland Correctional Institution - Jessup
